rukus.text: Fast approaching est reckoning popol ili est oblivious averse
When proof ven al them el their Lord est neo ili auxskult al gxi heedlessly
Their mens est heedless. transgressors confer secretly Est li ne just human est vi? Vi akcept magic prezent vi
Li dir My Lord kon cxiu opini heaven ter. Li est Hearer Omniscient
Ili ecx dir Hallucinations Li far gxi Li est poet! Let him montr us mirakl like those de previous messengers
Ni neniam annihilated kred community en des preter. Est these popol believers
Ni ne send vi hom ni inspir. Pet those kon scripture vi ne kon
Ni ne don them korp mangx nor est ili immortal
Ni fulfilled our promes them; ni sav them together whomever ni willed annihilated transgressors
Ni send vi scripture containing your message Vi ne kompren
